Package Boundary

Class MovieGoerInterface

java.lang.Object
Boundary.PersonInterface
Boundary.MovieGoerInterface
public class MovieGoerInterface
extends PersonInterface
Interface for movie-goer. Functionality includes:
  • List all movies
  • Search for movies
  • Book movie ticket(s)
  • Add movie review
  • List top 5 movies by sales
  • List top 5 movies by rating
  • Login as staff

All functionality is handled by MovieGoerMgr
Note that logging in as staff switches over to StaffInterface
Author:
SS3 Group 8
See Also:
StaffInterface, MovieGoerMgr
